00040     template<class value_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out>class colour_generator<value_t,N_in,N_out,false>: public MC_object_generator<value_t,std::vector<std::size_t>,N_in+N_out,true>
00041     {
00042         typedef MC_object_generator<value_t,std::vector<std::size_t>,N_in+N_out,true> base_type;
00043 
00044         public:
00045 
00046             /* Type definitions: */
00047             /*-------------------*/
00048 
00049             typedef value_t value_type;
00050             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00051             typedef std::vector<std::size_t> object_type;
00052 
00053             /* Public static data: */
00054             /*---------------------*/
00055 
00056             static const std::size_t N_tot=N_in+N_out;
00057

00059             /*------------------------*/

00061             /* Utility functions for named constructors: */

00063             template<class model_t>static vector<std::vector<size_type>*,N_tot> make_colour_vector(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00064             {
00065                 vector<std::vector<size_type>*,N_tot>result;
00066                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00067                 {
00068                     result[i]=it->get_phase_space(i)->get_colours();
00069                 }
00070                 return result;
00071             }
00072             template<class model_t>static vector<std::vector<size_type>,N_tot> make_colour_range_vector(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00073             {
00074                 vector<std::vector<size_type>,N_tot>result;
00075                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00076                 {
00077                     result[i]=it->get_phase_space(i)->particle_type->get_colour_index_ranges();
00078                 }
00079                 return result;
00080             }
00081             template<class model_t>static value_type make_prefactor(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00082             {
00083                 value_type result(1);
00084                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_in;++i)
00085                 {
00086                     result/=it->get_phase_space(i)->particle_type->colour_dof();
00087                 }
00088                 return result;
00089             }

00108             {
00109                 return col_ranges[i].size();

00194             virtual void LH_output(vector<int,N_tot>& colours,vector<int,N_tot>& anticolours) const
00195             {
00196                 colours.assign(0);
00197                 anticolours.assign(0);
00198             }
00199 
00202 
00203             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os=std::cout) const
00204             {
00205                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_in;++i)
00206                 {
00207                     os<<"(";
00208                     if(colour_rank(i)>0)
00209                     {
00210                         for(size_type j=0;j<colour_rank(i)-1;++j)
00211                         {
00212                             os<<colour(i,j)<<",";
00213                         }
00214                         os<<colour(i,colour_rank(i)-1);
00215                     }
00216                     os<<")";
00217                 }
00218                 os<<" > ";
00219                 for(size_type i=N_in;i<N_tot;++i)
00220                 {
00221                     os<<"(";
00222                     if(colour_rank(i)>0)
00223                     {
00224                         for(size_type j=0;j<colour_rank(i)-1;++j)
00225                         {
00226                             os<<colour(i,j)<<",";
00227                         }
00228                         os<<colour(i,colour_rank(i)-1);
00229                     }
00230                     os<<")";
00231                 }
00232                 os<<"\t\t\t"<<this->weight()<<std::endl;
00233                 return os;
00234             }
00235

00237

00243             /*-------------------------*/

00249             colour_generator(const vector<object_type*,N_tot>& cols_,const vector<std::vector<size_type>,N_tot>& col_ranges_):base_type(cols_),prefactor(1),col_ranges(col_ranges_){}
00250 
00252 
00253             colour_generator(const vector<object_type*,N_tot>& cols_,size_type Nc):base_type(cols_),prefactor(1)
00254             {
00255                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00256                 {
00257                     col_ranges[i]=std::vector<size_type>(cols_[i]->size(),Nc);
00258                 }
00259             }
00260 
00263 
00264             colour_generator(const vector<std::vector<size_type>,N_tot>& col_ranges_):col_ranges(col_ranges_),prefactor(1)
00265             {
00266                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00267                 {
00268                     this->get_object(i)->resize(col_ranges[i].size(),0);
00269                 }
00270             }
00271 
00275 
00276             colour_generator(const vector<size_type,N_tot>& col_ranks_,size_type Nc):prefactor(1)
00277             {
00278                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00279                 {
00280                     col_ranges[i]=std::vector<size_type>(col_ranks_[i],Nc);
00281                     this->get_object(i)->resize(col_ranks_[i],0);
00282                 }
00283             }
00284         
00285         private:
00286 
00287             /* Private data: */
00288             /*---------------*/
00289 
00290             /* External state colour range vectors. */
00291 
00292             vector<std::vector<size_type>,N_tot>col_ranges;
00293     };

00395 
00396             c_value_type& colour_coeff(size_type k,size_type i0,...)
00397             {
00398                 size_type n=0;
00399                 va_list I;
00400                 size_type i=i0;
00401                 va_start(I,i0);
00402                 for(size_type j=0;j<colour_rank(k);++j)
00403                 {
00404                     n+=(i*this->get_object(k)->block_size(j));
00405                     i=va_arg(I,size_type);
00406                 }
00407                 va_end(I);
00408                 return colour_entry(k,n);
00409             }
00410             
00412 
00413             const c_value_type& colour_coeff(size_type k,size_type i0,...) const
00414             {
00415                 size_type n=0;
00416                 va_list I;
00417                 size_type i=i0;
00418                 va_start(I,i0);
00419                 for(size_type j=0;j<colour_rank(k);++j)
00420                 {
00421                     n+=(i*this->get_object(k)->block_size(j));
00422                     i=va_arg(I,size_type);
00423                 }
00424                 va_end(I);
00425                 return colour_entry(k,n);
00426             }

00529             colour_generator(const vector<std::vector<size_type>,N_tot>& ranges):prefactor(1)
00530             {
00531                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00532                 {
00533                     this->get_object(i)->resize(ranges[i]);

00540 
00541             colour_generator(vector<size_type,N_tot>ranks,size_type Nc):prefactor(1)
00542             {

00544                 for(size_type i=0;i<N_tot;++i)
00545                 {
00546                     r.resize(ranks[i],Nc);
00547                     this->get_object(i)->resize(r);
00548                 }

00558     template<class value_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out>class colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,false>: public colour_generator<value_t,N_in,N_out,false>
00559     {
00560         public:
00561 
00562             /* Type definitions: */
00563             /*-------------------*/

00576

00578 
00579             template<class model_t>static colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,false>* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00580             {
00581                 colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,false>* result=new colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,false>(base_type::template make_colour_vector<model_t>(it),base_type::template make_colour_range_vector<model_t>(it));
00582                 result->prefactor=base_type::template make_prefactor<model_t>(it);
00583                 return result;
00584             }

00642     {
00643         public:
00644 
00645             /* Type definitions: */
00646             /*-------------------*/
00647 
00648             typedef colour_generator<value_t,N_in,N_out,true> base_type;
00649             typedef typename base_type::object_type object_type;
00650             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00651

00659

00661 
00662             template<class model_t>static colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,true>* create_instance(typename CM_algorithm<model_t,N_in,N_out>::tree_iterator it)
00663             {
00664                 colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,true>* result=new colour_summer<value_t,N_in,N_out,true>(base_type::template make_colour_tensor_vector<model_t>(it));
00665                 result->prefactor=base_type::template make_prefactor<model_t>(it);
00666                 return result;
